amendatorysection.para: Any person who violates such permanent injunction, presents or attempts to file as his own the certificate of registration of another, who shall give false or forged evidence of any kind to the board in obtaining a certificate of registration, who indorses any document which he did not actually prepare or supervise the preparation, who shall falsely impersonate another practitioner of like or different name, or who shall use a revoked certificate of registration shall be deemed guilty of a Class III misdemeanor.
